name: Dungeons & Debuffs
description:
Play now: Unity WebGL Player | gaem jam (sudoer777.github.io)

Use WASD to move!

Mouse to aim. left click to shoot 

Hold SPACE to sprint!

Producers of Dungeons & Debuffs

  • Clement Lee: Tile and decor pixel art, UI displays art
  • Shelley Sugiharto: Characters, weapons, and  pixel art
  • Ethan Reece : C# programmer
  • Josiah Kiok: C# programmer
  • Zach Rider: SFX 

Outside help:
